website_summaries.verdict: This micro shredder cross cuts into very small pieces and has a large capacity wastebasket.
pros: Waste compartment can handle 7.9 gallons before empty
Can shred for 4 hours straight before needing a cool down time
Only needs 10 minutes of cool down time
A well made unit that is sturdy and works well for a long period of time
cons: The bin can be difficult to use with a plastic trash bag

customer_reviews.title: Shredder works well, but has manufacturer defects
customer_reviews.text: Shredder works well, but has manufacturer defects; I contacted the seller, but never heard from them, and that is my reason for the poor rating. The internal workings of the shredder work well, but the outside shell, that everyone see's is the issue. Never hearing back from the seller shakes my confidence in them, their customer service, and any future warranty issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Ware

customer_reviews.title: SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't micro shred....it PULVERIZES! The paper is shred into dust. It's quite dirty to empty. Paper dust flies everywhere. To make matters worse it's very slow. Still thinking about sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why can nobody make a shredder feed slot work correctly?
customer_reviews.text: It does everything in the specs, and is quiet, but, and this is the major annoyance, there is something just before the shredder teeth that pages hang up on. You have to force the pages past whatever this is, and when dropping in a few pages at a time, the middle ones go through, and the outside one hangs, so you have to push it past whatever is down there messing up the feed path. It is quiet, but the constant irritation of needing to force papers into the shredder teeth is a major detractor.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rush

customer_reviews.title: It's  Great
customer_reviews.text: The shredder is very quite. It does just what it is advertised to do. Just wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: it runs then just shuts off tray to catch dvd are missing I return it for credit. I would never buy this name again
customer_reviews.author: Deramax

customer_reviews.title: Quit working. Can't figure out how to contact the company.
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty happy with this unit until it just stopped working. There doesn't seem to be a way to contact them for warranty work. No e-mail links or US numbers to call.
customer_reviews.author: consumer22

customer_reviews.title: FINE PRODUCT,SHREDDING PERFORMANCE, AND OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for home business, obsolete paper patient medical records, old tax info, CD's, credit cards, and downsizing in general. It performs like the energizer bunny and saved us thousands in private companies doing the job. Also, it is convenient and secure. Despite having tons of files to destroy(we are still at it), we simply have never reached the 4 hour capacity for a cool down. Keep it lubricated as directed and you will be pleased. Downside, is 5 page limit per quick run.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in GA

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - Do NOT Trust Dimensions - Triple Sized!
customer_reviews.text: The 5S30 is overpowered for my needs. I don't need P-6 security, but the listed dimensions were great for my needs & I was willing to pay for it. This thing is HUGE. Replace the 5.51 dimension with closer 13, and the 12 with closer 16.5. Yeah, more than triple the advertised size. Now I get to make a trip inside UPS during the pandemic, fun.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the 5S30 model today, a day a head of the stated delivery date. It's heavy. It was fun watching the postal guy carry it to the house. It shreds very finely. CD/DVDs are not cross cut but are cut in strips. No big deal to me though. I've already filled the 8 gallon bin once with no issues. I like the touch controls and the "chirps" it makes when you turn it on. Has a 3 year warranty. You do need to oil the cutters after filling the bin up twice. Great shredder so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: For home use for just personal papers that have my PII on it I am extremely happy. The next test will be time
customer_reviews.text: I work in a field that needs to have an NSA approved high security shredder. This is obviously not one and it is for home use but it is giving the same results. The feeding is slower then the ones at work but it shreds just as well. For home use for just personal papers that have my PII on it I am extremely happy. The next test will be time. This printer is good for any small office. Please don't forget to buy the prober oil. Trick with shredders is always slow and steady.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This shredder is the best! I am so tired of shredders that heat ...
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is the best! I am so tired of shredders that heat up and stop working after only a small stack. Then the wait time to cool down - annoying and prolongs the job. This shredder is a continuous feed. And it shreds your documents into very small fragments. I am very satisfied with this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brownlow

customer_reviews.title: works and your important papers become almost like saw dust.
customer_reviews.text: its not light weight when received but packing was more than adequate. a little pricey but you get what you pay for and in this case it shreds into almost dust. i highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I bought this for the long cut time and the micro shredding. I used it for 4 hours straight with out any issues. I used the lubricating paper about once every 45 minutes or so. This thing annihilates paper to a size I doubt anyone could piece together. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Shredder does an excellent job of dicing paper into very tiny pieces. There is no coming back once the paper is shredded. The unit is very quiet. It shreds a little slower than I would like, but that is the trade off for the minuscule size of the particles that it creates. Had a problem with the shredder, and contacted customer support. They worked quickly to help identify the problem, and sent me a replacement. I am very happy with their customer service. In summary, this is the nicest shredder I have ever had, and I am very happy with the quality of the shredding process.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Munson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that there is only the bin that holds the shreds of paper. There is no bag for easy cleaning. Otherwise not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Feed this confetti to dumpster divers!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! No one can paste these shreddings back together! Perfect for home use to get rid of those billings with account numbers (a bit slow for corporate shredding). I've used the credit card capability and I expect to shred CDs and DVDs (but haven't so far).
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Super Security
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many shredders over the years, but no other product has shredded my documents as finely as this one. This product provides the highest security of any shredder I have ever seen. The negatives are delayed feed and slow feed, but the security is beyond compare.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Kashi

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a P-6 security shredder or better then the Bonsaii EverShred Pro 5S30 will fill your ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a P-6 security shredder or better then the Bonsaii EverShred Pro 5S30 will fill your needs. Excellent micro-cut performance. All my documents are shredded into confetti. I would suggest buying some shredder oil to maintain the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: best home shredder I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This thing practically turns the paper into dust. My only complaint is that it wasn't available in black. I can't attest to the longevity because I haven't had it very long, but it has worked flawlessly so far. It is also much quiter than my previous shredder (fellowes).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But this is excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 star if it took more sheets at a time or had an automatic feed. But this is excellent for the price. I can only feed about 3-5 sheets at a time. Can feed some junk credit card offers in envelope. I have gone for about an hour straight and filled the tray with no issues. Shreds paper and cards very finely.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Works shredding checks into unreadable minced confetti. The bucket ...
customer_reviews.text: Works shredding checks into unreadable minced confetti. The bucket has plastic tabs that click into place when removing or installing the bucket. Got the extended warranty as well the manual does not say where the repair center Is located. It is called Bonsai and could be in Japan or another country.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J.

customer_reviews.title: THIS is a great scanner. The best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Microfine confetti that even the NSA or FBI can't put back together. I've had scanners. THIS is a great scanner. The best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine that does the job
customer_reviews.text: A little slower than I was hopping but it does a good job. Does not cut folded up packet of sheets very well need to feed 5-7 at a time
customer_reviews.author: E. J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not your average shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not your average shredder! Practically pulverized the paper!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Y. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, it was better than expected, superb condition, would deal with again, highly recommended, shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Very good shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is probably the best value for the quality of shred. Compatible to machines costing thousands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Hi security and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a high security shredder and this does a great job so far. The paper looks like little granules after shredding. So far very satisfied. The power on chirp sound is pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: mjohio

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it was working until it made a horrible noise and seized up. Less than one month old. Emailed company and no response as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good value.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder works better than any other that we’ve had. It’s relatively quiet too. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Think twice.
customer_reviews.text: this worked great for about 3 weeks. Now it's leaving long strands of paper as of the rollers have moved. Attempting an exchange but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I was looking for in a paper shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shredder
customer_reviews.text: Extremely secure and much quieter than any shredder I’ve owned. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not turn on. I did the "unplug for 45min" but I unplugged all night. still no working shredder. Outside of Amazon Warranty. The Mfg said they will replace it. What if it happens again? At $350 for a shredder I would not expect it to break down and quit. My old shredder I had for 10 years. So totally disappointed in this Bonsaii shredder.
customer_reviews.author: 007 BOND

customer_reviews.title: It would be nicer if it had a 10-sheet capacity to better shred junk mail
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about this shredder is something I knew when I bought it -- 5 sheet capacity. It would be nicer if it had a 10-sheet capacity to better shred junk mail. That said, it's quiet, it absolutely obliterates anything you put in it to the point that an NSA forensics team probably couldn't reconstruct it, it doesn't jam, and it has a 4 hour run time. If you aren't going nuts with shredding like I am (a couple years of junk mail accumulation) and you don't need/want the higher security level, I'd go with the Bonsaii C149-D. It has a 12 sheet capacity, the same auto-jam mechanism, and rates a P-4.
customer_reviews.author: Subrandom

product_meta.title: Bonsaii 240-Minute Heavy-Duty Shredder, P-6 High-Security Micro-Cut Paper Shredder for Home & Office Use, Shreds CD/Credit Cards, 5-Sheet Shredding Capacity, White (5S30)
product_meta.description:
Size:5-Sheet Micro Cut
Advanced Cooling System: 240 MINUTES CONTINUOUS RUNNING TIME
High security micro-cut: Provides ultimate protection with particles 6 times smaller than typical cross-cut.

Bonsaii Heavy duty P-6 High security micro-cut paper shredder will run continuously for 240 minutes while only need a 10-minute rest with a patented cooling-down system. It shreds paper, credit cards, staples, paper clips, and junkmail even CD/DVD.

Patented Cutting Technology 
Bonsaii Evershred 5S30 provides you with the ultimate solution for reliable and durable documents destruction with solid cutters. High precision engineering provides an unsurpassed cutting quality and higher security which ensures your confidential and sensitive financial documents be shredded into 1/26 by 5/21 inches tiny pieces (Security Level P-6) to minimize your chances of falling victim to the havoc and hassle of identity theft. 

Anti-jam Technology
This shredding machine equipped with an ultra-reliable and ultra-durable automatic anti-jam system which means that the cutter will automatically reverse in the first place to prevent the shredder from getting overloaded and broken.

What’s in the packaging
Shredder x 1
Instruction Manual x 1
feature_bullets: Raise Work Efficiency - Heavy duty shredding machine’s continuous running time up to 240 minutes without stopping for destroying mass private paper, credit card, CD/DVD, clip and staples documents at the speed of 6.5 feet per minute.

Help Safeguard Your Identity - High-security super micro-cut paper shredder makes a great choice for effectively protecting personal data. It can shred 5 sheets (A4 size, 75g/m2) at one time into tiny particles measuring 1/26 by 5/21 inches, meeting security level P6 standards.
Maintain Quiet Indoor Environment - With 58dB ultra-low noise, it helps to eliminate noisy disruptions and makes a silent workspaces for home, office, commercial business, embassy and industrial use.

Automatic Jam Clearance - Equipped with an ultra-reliable and ultra-durable automatic anti-jam system, Bonsaii 5S30 shredder‘s cutter could automatically reverses to prevent the jam happening in the first place when over-loading.

Add Convenience of Using – With a 8 gallons large pull-out wastebasket, it could hold a lot of paper scrapes by seeing through transparent window and reduce emptying times. Also, installing a 0.37 gallons separate small bin is to collect CD/DVD and credit card pieces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
